name: SAVE CHRISTMAS! (Piotrek4)
description:
FULLSCREEN THE GAME TO FIX ITS RESOULTION!

SAVE CHRISTMAS GAME!

hellou! I made this game for JAME GAM 2021! You have to defeat grinch gang before it's too late! Jump on the grinch's head to destroy him, but DONT let him destroy YOU! :D Beware the Grinch Master - dont touch him! Just grab glock17 and shoot him down! 

The game contains christmas-style textures and very fun to play physics!
I really appreciate your rating! Have fun bro!

Music Composers:
CAMMY https://cammytown.itch.io/
Prod Marrow https://twitter.com/_M4RR0W_
